entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wekweeti
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:26 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 38 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
